tool_description: Generates cryptocurrency addresses from private keys for various blockchain networks, supporting different address formats and encoding standards.

blockchain_type.description: Target blockchain: bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash

address_format.description: Address format: legacy, segwit, bech32 (Bitcoin-based only)

error_messages: Invalid private key: Private key must be valid hex format (64 characters).
Unsupported blockchain: Use one of [bitcoin, ethereum, litecoin, dogecoin, bitcoin_cash].
Invalid address format: Format must be one of [legacy, segwit, bech32] for Bitcoin-based chains.
Format not supported: Selected address format is not supported for the specified blockchain.
usage: Provide private_key and blockchain_type, optionally specify address_format and compressed_key settings. Returns the generated address and associated metadata.

public_key.description: Public key corresponding to the private key
